alert.note: Alert for Lower Terrebonne (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 2:23PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Terrebonne Parish through 300 PM CDT... At 222 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cocodrie, or 18 miles southwest of Galliano, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain and wind gusts to around 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cocodrie, Chauvin, Tambour Bay Buoy and Lumcon Center Buoy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is also occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
